Class SpecificationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.fitnessforge.utils.SpecificationUtils
public class SpecificationUtils extends Object
Description:

An Utility class for defining specification rules using org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification, the specification rules which can than be used directly on database queries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SpecificationUtils()
    Empty Default Constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T>
    equal(String field, Object value)
    The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the '=' opeartor to check for any entity equal to the passed value.
    static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T>
    in(String field, List<?> values)
    The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the 'in' opeartor to check whether defined value in the list of values is present inside the defined column.
    static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T>
    like(String field, Object value)
    The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the 'like' opeartor to check for any entity equal to the passed value.
    static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T>
    notIn(String field, List<?> values)
    The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the 'not in' opeartor to check whether defined value in the list of values is not present inside the defined column.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • equal

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equal(String field, Object value)
      The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the '=' opeartor to check for any entity equal to the passed value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of different generic specification
      Parameters:
      field - The column name from the database.
      value - The value to compared with to be equal.
      Returns:
      An object of org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification.

    • like

      The method takes the value passed in the paramter and uses it run a query using the 'like' opeartor to check for any entity equal to the passed value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of different generic specification
      Parameters:
      field - The column name from the database.
      value - The value to compared with to be like.
      Returns:
      An object of org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification.

    • in

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> in(String field, List<?> values)

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
